Package main.G1HRPS

Class PaymentManager

java.lang.Object
main.G1HRPS.DatabaseHandler
main.G1HRPS.PaymentManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Supermanager<Payment>
public class PaymentManager extends DatabaseHandler implements Supermanager<Payment>
Implements the Supermanager class to handle all the payments made by guests.
Author:
Kim Sang Hyeon

  • Method Details

    • CreateNewPayment

      public Payment CreateNewPayment(String guest_id, int room_num, int discounts, int tax, float room_charges, float room_service_charges, PaymentStatus status)
      Creates new payment and adds it to payment list.
      Parameters:
      guest_id - Guest ID of guest that made payment
      room_num - Room associated with this payment
      discounts - Discount percentage in the range of (0.0-1.0)
      tax - Tax on bill total in the range of (0.0-1.0)
      room_charges - Total room charge of this payment
      room_service_charges - Total room service charge of this payment
      status - Status of payment
      Returns:
      Payment object if successful, else null

    • SearchList

      public Payment SearchList(int room_num)
      Overloads the SearchList function. Search for any pending payment of a room with given room number. Any such room is currently occupied and not checked-out.
      Parameters:
      room_num - Room number to be searched for.
      Returns:
      Payment pending on the room.

    • GetList

      public List<Payment> GetList()
      Gets payment list.
      Specified by:
      GetList in interface Supermanager<Payment>
      Returns:
      List containing all payments.

    • SetPaymentStatus

      public void SetPaymentStatus(Payment payment, PaymentStatus new_status)
      Sets a new payment status to the given payment.
      Parameters:
      payment - Object to set new status
      new_status - Status to be set for object

    • GetPaymentStatus

      public PaymentStatus GetPaymentStatus(Payment payment)
      Gets the current payment status of the given payment.
      Parameters:
      payment - Object to get status of.
      Returns:
      PaymentStatus of the payment.

    • GenerateAndPrintBill

      public Pair<String,Payment> GenerateAndPrintBill(String guest_id, int room_num, int days_of_stay, float room_charge, int discounts, int tax, List<RoomServiceOrder> room_service_orders)
      Generates a new payment using given number of days of stay and inputs the bill into string format to be printed.
      Parameters:
      guest_id - Id of guest responsible for this payment
      room_num - Room number for this payment
      days_of_stay - Number of days checked in for this room number
      room_charge - Price of room per night
      discounts - Discount percentage to be applied
      tax - Tax percentage to be applied
      room_service_orders - List of room services ordered
      Returns:
      Pair.A: String of Bill to be printed, Pair.B: New Payment object.

    • GenerateAndPrintBill

      public Pair<String,Payment> GenerateAndPrintBill(String guest_id, int room_num, LocalDateTime check_in_date, float room_charge, int discounts, int tax, List<RoomServiceOrder> room_service_orders)
      Generates a new payment using given check in date to calculate days of stay and inputs the bill into string format to be printed.
      Parameters:
      guest_id - Id of guest responsible for this payment
      room_num - Room number for this payment
      check_in_date - Date in which guest checked in, to be calculated with today's date to get days of stay
      room_charge - Price of room per night
      discounts - Discount percentage to be applied
      tax - Tax percentage to be applied
      room_service_orders - List of room services ordered
      Returns:
      Pair.A: String of Bill to be printed, Pair.B: New Payment object.

      Tokenize each line in the database into an object.

    • SearchList

      public Payment SearchList(String payment_id)
      Method overrides the SearchList(String search_text) in Supermanager interface and returns a payment with matching search text.
      Specified by:
      SearchList in interface Supermanager<Payment>
      Parameters:
      payment_id - String converted payment ID that was originally of type UUID.
      Returns:
      payment with the matching payment ID.
